sentences.sContent: His secretary stopped taking notes to gape at me.
sentences.sCn: 他的秘书停止了做记录，目瞪口呆地看着我。

sentences.sContent: He was not the type to wander around gaping at everything like a tourist.
sentences.sCn: 他不是那种像个游客似的四处闲逛、惊奇地看着一切的人。

remMethod.val: 地面上裂开(gape)一个大裂口(gap)

trans.tranCn: 裂开； 目瞪口呆地凝视
trans.tranOther: If you gape, you look at someone or something in surprise, usually with an open mouth
